description.value:
Level 3 Necromancy

Casting Time: 1 action

Range: undefined touch

Components: V, S

Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

You touch a creature, which must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration. Until the curse ends, the target suffers one of the following effects of your choice: • Choose one ability. The target has Disadvantage|XPHB on ability checks and saving throws made with that ability. • The target has Disadvantage|XPHB on attack rolls against you. • In combat, the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns or be forced to take the Dodge|XPHB action on that turn. • If you deal damage to the target with an attack roll or a spell, the target takes an extra 1d8 Necrotic damage.

At Higher Levels: If you cast this spell using a level 4 spell slot, you can maintain Concentration|XPHB on it for up to 10 minutes. If you use a level 5+ spell slot, the spell doesn't require Concentration|XPHB, and the duration becomes 8 hours (level 5-6 slot) or 24 hours (level 7-8 slot). If you use a level 9 spell slot, the spell lasts until dispelled.
